name: RM080416
description:
Controls:

WASD - Movement
Mouse - Look
Click - Focus Camera
R - Put Away/Bring Out Radio
QE - Lean
F - Flashlight
Mouse Wheel - Change Radio Channel
Space - Pause
Escape - Back to Menu 
Shift - Sprint

Gameplay & Script - Josh Wade
